summary: Just a rather grand but simple balcony for the Markarth house. Nice view, nice water feature, nice furnishings.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Just a rather grand but simple balcony for the Markarth house. Nice view, nice water feature, nice furnishings.
